revised_title: The Impact of Pre-Breeding Diet on Reproductive Output in Zebra Finches
tldr: This study shows that the quality of diet a female zebra finch receives before the breeding season has a significant impact on reproductive output. Female zebra finches given a high-quality diet before pairing produced larger eggs, larger clutches, had higher hatching success, and fledged more young. The research highlights the importance of nutritional factors in clutch determination and female fitness.
